member.name: T:PossibleDiary.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:PossibleDiary.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:PossibleDiary.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:PossibleDiary.Iconhelper.Iconhelper.GetIconImage(System.String,PossibleDiary.Iconhelper.IconSizes)
member.summary: Gets a Bitmap image of the specified file or folder icon.
member.param: The full path to the folder or file to get the icon image from, or just a file extension (.ext) to get the registered icon image of the file type.
The size of the icon to retrieve.
